main event: A civilian observed one round object at Kirkland AFB, New Mexico on 27 June 1949.
interesting points: The object was slightly larger than the brightest star visible and had an orange color., It made no sound or odor during the observation., The object gradually increased in brightness as it sped up and flared up at times., The observer was located on the second floor of a barrack., The observation lasted approximately 2 minutes.
sighted object: one round orange object in the sky
witness description: Clerk Typist, Security division, 17th District OSI
